short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to generate various types of test data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Test Data Generator

Test Data Generator is a powerful Chrome extension designed specifically for SDETs (Software Development Engineers in Test) and developers who need to quickly generate a variety of dummy data for testing purposes. Whether you’re working on forms, APIs, or UI tests, this tool will save you time and effort by providing realistic test data at the click of a button.

Features
Generate IMEI Numbers: Produce valid IMEI numbers using the Luhn algorithm, ideal for testing mobile applications and devices.
Generate UUIDs: Create unique identifiers instantly.
Names: Get random first names and last names to test user registration and profile forms.
Addresses: Generate realistic addresses to populate shipping forms or databases.
Zip Codes: Randomly generate zip codes from various regions.
Credit Card Numbers: Produce valid credit card numbers using the Luhn algorithm for e-commerce testing.
Phone Numbers: Generate random phone numbers in various formats, customizable via the options page.
Email Addresses: Get a variety of email addresses to test account creation and email notifications.
Dates: Generate random dates with customizable formats, including ISO, US, and EU date formats.
How It Works
Easy Access: Simply right-click on any input field and choose the type of data you want to insert from the context menu.
Variety of Data: Each click generates a new piece of data, ensuring variety and realism.
Configurable Options: Customize your preferences in the options page, including phone number formats, date formats, and more. These settings are stored locally to ensure privacy and will reset to default if browser data is cleared.
Use Cases
Form Testing: Quickly fill out registration forms, contact forms, or any other form fields with realistic data.
API Testing: Generate data for payloads to test your APIs.
UI Testing: Populate user profiles, address fields, and other UI elements with diverse and realistic test data.
E-commerce Testing: Validate your checkout processes and payment gateways with realistic credit card numbers and addresses.
Why Choose Test Data Generator?
Time-Saving: Instantly generate test data without manual entry.
Consistency: Ensure consistent and varied data for comprehensive testing.
Ease of Use: User-friendly interface and simple configuration options.
Privacy First: All settings are stored locally on your browser, ensuring that your data remains private and secure.
Installation
Click “Add to Chrome” to install the extension.
Access the extension from the Chrome toolbar.
Configure your preferences via the options page.
Enhance your testing workflow with Test Data Generator, and streamline the process of generating high-quality test data effortlessly!
